New Records: Utah Jazz set a new season high with 135 points
Utah Jazz set a new season high with 35 assists
Utah Jazz set a new season high with 16 3-pointers
Utah Jazz set a new season low with 12 turnovers
Key Match Events: Keyonte George caught fire with 33 points and 9 assists
John Collins anchored the second unit with a 28-point, 13-rebound double-double
Collins' first-half poster on Coby White was a highlight of the game
George's fourth-quarter dropoff pass to Drew Eubanks was a highlight of the game
Pre-Game Insights: The Utah Jazz had struggled on the offensive end of the floor to open the 2024-25 season
The Jazz were looking to break out of their slump against the Chicago Bulls
Post-Match Reflections: Jazz head coach Will Hardy praised the team's performance, saying 'that's how we want the game to feel'
Keyonte George said 'we wanted to come out and show that we can compete at a high level, play together, and play the right game'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Jazz's floor spacing adjustment, having the five man in the dunker spot, was effective against the Bulls
Cody Williams had a well-rounded effort with 11 points, 5 rebounds, and 4 assists
Others: The Utah Jazz rank sixth in the league in frequency of corner 3-point attempts
